title: Where to find green small business grants - Small Business UK - http://smallbusiness.co.uk
summary: This article lists a series of UK government grants that support sustainable innovations. Some of the grants support the implementation of energy efficiency improvements, while others support the development of green products or processes. Loans and investments are also available to businesses seeking to develop solutions beyond the mainstream of current thinking.
likely_naics_codes: ['325110 - Wood Preservation', '336992 - Fabricated Pipe and Pipe Fitting Manufacturing', '562211 - Solid Waste Collection', '562920 - Waste Treatment and Disposal']
greenwashing: No explicit examples of greenwashing were found within the article.
